extension.name: Class that runs operations at startup

option.name: Optimization Level (-O...)
option.tip: Specify optimization level
Amount of debugger information to be generated
option.name: Debug Level (-g, -g0, -g1)
Preprocessor Defines (one per line)
option.tip: Define preprocessor symbols

option.name: Preprocessor Undefines (one per line)
option.tip: Undefine those preprocessor symbols that are predefined

option.name: Include Directories (one per line)
option.tip: Specify directories to search for include files

option.name: Include Profiling Information (-pg) (affects linking also)
option.tip: Generate profiling information at runtime

option.name: Embedded C++ (-Hecpp)
option.tip: Restrict language to Embedded C++ subset

option.name: Generate Exception-Aware Code (-Hexcept)
option.tip: Enable exception-aware code.

option.name: Recognize "bool" keyword (C++ only)
option.tip: If true, "bool" will be recognized as a keyword

option.name: Restrict scope of for-loop variables
option.tip: For-loop index variable's scope to restricted to the for loop

option.name: Display copyright (-Hnocopyr)
option.tip: Suppress copyright message

option.name: Additional Compiler Flags
option.tip: Specify additional compiler flags

option.name: Pragma specifications [e.g., offwarn(123)]
option.tip: Specify pragmas to be processed at start of compilation
Assume pointer contents are typed as declared
option.name: Behaved - assume program is "behaved"

option.tip: Generate tracing code at each call
option.name: Call_trace - Generate tracing code at each call

option.tip: Generate object file comment with compiler information
option.name: Command_line_ident - emit compiler version in object file

option.tip: Treat small common variables as export
option.name: Common_in_small_data

option.tip: Implicitly define static class variables (C++)
option.name: Define_static_members - implicitly define static class variables (C++)

option.tip: Do all floating point operations in at least double precision
option.name: Double_math_only - do floating point in double precision

option.tip: Treat non-prototyped functions returning "float" as if returning "double"
option.name: Double_return - non-prototyped functions returning "float" treated as double

option.tip: Downshift file names in all #include directives
option.name: Downshift_file_names - downshift file names in all #include directives

option.tip: Insert code in each function epilog to display information
option.name: Epilog_trace - display each function exit

option.tip: Warn about functions with no return type that fail to return an integer
option.name: Int_function_warnings -- warn about functions with no return type

option.tip: Remove superflious "../" sequences in file names of diagnostic messages
option.name: Normalize_file_names

option.tip: Suppress the alignment of packed structs
option.name: Packed_means_unaligned - Suppress the alignment of packed structs

option.tip: Warn about assignments into parameter variables
option.name: Parm_assignment_warnings - warn about assignments into parameters

option.tip: Insert calls at each function prolog to display information
option.name: Prolog_trace - display function name in prolog

option.tip: Map all string constants into a read-only data section
option.name: Read_only_strings -- map all strings in read-only section

option.tip: Inline certain functions of the ANSI C library
option.name: Recognize_library - Inline certain functions of ANSI C library

option.tip: Recognize the ANSI C trigraph sequences
option.name: Recognize_trigraphs

option.tip: Relaxes compatibility rules between pointer types
option.name: Make all pointers assignment compatible

option.tip: Allow integers and pointers to be assignment compatible
option.name: Make pointers compatible with integers

option.tip: Enum variables will always be mapped to a full 32 bits
option.name: Always map enum types to full word
Make "char" signed by default
option.tip: Specify "char" is signed or unsigned.

option.name: Treat "char" and the signed/unsigned equivalent the same
option.tip: Specify whether "char" is to be equivalent to "signed char" or "unsigned char".

option.name: Inline certain ANSI functions
option.tip: Permit compiler to inline a subset of the ANSI functions

option.name: Be compatible with the Portable C Compiler (PCC)
option.tip: Relax language rules to coincide with the Portable C Compiler

option.name: Suppress all function inlining (-Hnoinline)
option.tip: Suppress the inlining of functions

option.name: Preserve generated assembly files
option.tip: Prevent the deletion of the generated assembly file

option.name: Annotate assembly files (-Hanno)
option.tip: Annotate the generated assembly file with source statements

option.name: Map uninitialized globals as "common"
option.tip: Map uninitialized global variables to named common

option.name: Map qualifying variables to "small data" section
option.tip: Place qualifying static variables into "small data" section (.sdata)

option.name: Endian
option.tip: Specify the endianess of the target code

option.name: Map each function in its own text section
option.tip: Place each function definition in its own control section

option.name: Place private labels into symbol table (-L)
option.tip: Don't exclude private labels from symbol table

option.name: Include debug line information (-g)
option.tip: Generate line table information for the debugger

option.name: Directories to search for .include files
option.tip: Specify directories to search for include files

option.name: Preprocessor Defines (one per line)
option.tip: Define preprocessor symbols

option.name: Preprocessor Undefines (one per line)
option.tip: Specify predefined symbols to be undefined

option.name: Display copyright (-Hnocopyr)
option.tip: Specify whether or not the copyright message is to be displayed

option.name: Additional assembler options
option.tip: Specify additional assembler options that are not otherwise available

option.name: Suppress warning messages (-w)
option.tip: Suppress warning messages

option.name: Endian
option.tip: Specify the endian of the target

option.name: Link in the Hostlink Libraries
option.tip: Link in the hostlink libraries so that the simulator can do I/O

option.name: Library Search Paths (for -lx)
option.tip: Specify library seasrch paths for the "-lx" options

option.name: Additional Object Files && Libraries
option.tip: List paths to additional object files and libraries

option.name: Display copyright (-q)
option.tip: Specify whether or not to display copyright message

option.name: Additional options for linking (one per line)
option.tip: Specify any additional options for linking that are not otherwise available

option.name: Include profiling code (-pg)
option.tip: Arrange to generate profilling information at runtime

option.name: SVR3-style command files
option.tip: Specify Unix SVR3-style command files

option.name: SVR4-style command files
option.tip: Specify SVR4-style command files

option.name: Search libraries together as a group (-Bgrouplib)
option.tip: Effectively combine all libraries so that early ones can resolve unresolved symbols in later ones

option.name: Generate listing file (=.map)
option.tip: Generate a listing file

option.name: Display cross-reference in map file (-Ccrossref)
option.tip: Display cross-reference information in listing file against section and object file.

option.name: Display cross-reference against referencing function (-Ccrossfunc)
option.tip: Display cross-reference information in listing file against the function from which each reference occurs.

option.name: Display globals in map file (-Cglobals)
option.tip: Display global symbols within listing file

option.name: Display symbols referenced from each function (-Cfunctions)
option.tip: For each function, list the symbols referenced and the relative offset of the reference.

option.name: Display section mappings (-Csections)
option.tip: Display section addresses within listing file

option.name: Display symbol table (-Csymbols)
option.tip: Display complete symbol table within the listing file.

option.name: Display summary of linker-generated tables (-Ctables)
option.tip: Generate a summary of various linker-defined tables in the listing file.

option.name: Unmangle C++ names (-Cunmangle)
option.tip: Display C++ symbols in a readable form

option.name: List unreferenced files or sections (-zlistunref)
option.tip: Produce list of unreferenced files and control sections

option.name: Endian
option.tip: Indicate which library to link against based on endian

option.name: Generate PIC table (-Hpictable)
option.tip: Generate position-independent code

option.name: Initialize read/write data from ROM .initdat section (-Bcopydata)
option.tip: Arrange to create read/writable data sections by copying from the ".initdat" section in ROM

option.name: Zero BSS at startup (-Bzerobss)
option.tip: Arrange to zero BSS during runtime startup

option.name: Purge unreferenced text sections (-zpurgetext)
option.tip: Transitively delete all unreferenced sections.

option.name: Compress the .initdat section content (-Xnocompress)
option.tip: Specify whether or not to compress the content of the .initdat section.

option.name: Show compression statistics for .initdata section (-Xcompress_stats)
option.tip: Display compression statistics for the .initdata section (not recognized if no .initdat section in link)

option.name: Link in default startup code (-Hnocrt)
option.tip: Specify whether or not to include C startup code

option.name: Link in standard C/C++ library (-Hnolib)
option.tip: Specify whether or not to include the C runtime library

option.name: Include RTOS-specific thread library
option.tip: Specify RTOS library to link against

option.name: Entry point (-e)
option.tip: Specify the entry-point name

option.name: Permit duplicate symbols with warning (-zdups)
option.tip: Specifiy whether duplicate symbols are permitted

extension.name: MetaWare C/C++ Scanner Configuration Discovery Profile

action.label: MetaWare Toolkit Documentation...
action.tooltip: Open MetaWare tool set online documentation.
